numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that there are more players of color than coaches of color in sports.
2. I wonder why the percentage of coaches of color is less than 50%.
3. I also wonder why MLB has a low percentage of people of color.
4. This graph has the potential to positively impact my community.
5. This graph has the potential to negatively impact my community.
6. The impact depends on the viewpoint of a person.
7. From a positive viewpoint, the vast majority of players are people of color.
8. From a negative viewpoint, people of color are a minority among coaches.
9. A person may want to be a coach.
10. If a person wants to be a coach and notices that people of color are a minority among coaches then the person may be negatively affected.
11. The title is: Why does racial diversity differ from players to coaches?
